channel.title: Owning a server?
channel.description:
I downloaded the server starter pack, considering I'm new to this whole thing. In the client.java it says to own this server, press ctrl and h and replace "owner user name" with your username.
I've done that and nothing happened. Is there any other way I can set myself as the owner or an admin? Please help, and thanks in advance.

item.title: Owning a server?
item.dc:creator: @04rsxs 04rsxs
item.description:
@04rsxs wrote:

You’re welcome, glad I could help.

Read full topic

item.title: Owning a server?

item.description:
@dragonkid575 wrote:

thank you so much!

Read full topic

item.title: Owning a server?
item.dc:creator: @04rsxs 04rsxs
item.description:
@04rsxs wrote:

It meant press Cntl + F, this is the find command in wordpad, find “your servername here” or whatever and replace it with your servername.

To make a character owner, after you have logged in atleast once, there will be a .txt file in the Characters folder for your player. Change the playerrights from 0 to 3.

0 - Normal Player
1 - Moderator
2 - Administrator
3 - Owner

Hope this helps you.

Read full topic
